articles.title: Exclusive: Arm hires Amazon AI chip director to aid in-house effort
articles.summary: Arm Holdings has hired former Amazon.com artificial intelligence chip director Rami Sinno to bolster its plans to develop its own complete chips, according to a person familiar with the matter.
articles.translated_title: Exclusive: Arm hires Amazon AI chip director to aid in-house effort
articles.translated_summary: Arm Holdings has hired former Amazon.com artificial intelligence chip director Rami Sinno to bolster its plans to develop its own complete chips, according to a person familiar with the matter.

articles.title: As Meta Faces AI Scrutiny, Mounting Regulatory Risk Overshadows Strong Earnings And Pushes Stock Lower
articles.summary: Meta Platforms shares are trading lower Monday afternoon. The company is navigating a series of headwinds related to its artificial intelligence strategy.
articles.translated_title: As Meta Faces AI Scrutiny, Mounting Regulatory Risk Overshadows Strong Earnings And Pushes Stock Lower
articles.translated_summary: Meta Platforms shares are trading lower Monday afternoon. The company is navigating a series of headwinds related to its artificial intelligence strategy.

articles.title: Philips CEO Jeff DiLullo on how AI is changing healthcare today
articles.summary: From faster MRI scans to earlier cancer diagnoses, Philips is betting big on artificial intelligence to transform patient care and ease the strain on clinicians.
articles.translated_title: Philips CEO Jeff DiLullo on how AI is changing healthcare today
articles.translated_summary: From faster MRI scans to earlier cancer diagnoses, Philips is betting big on artificial intelligence to transform patient care and ease the strain on clinicians.

articles.title: Private Credit-Powered AI Boom at Risk of Overheating, UBS Says
articles.summary: Private credit lenders, and their deep pockets, are rapidly becoming an important source of capital for artificial intelligence development. That’s raising concerns at UBS Global Research.
articles.translated_title: Private Credit-Powered AI Boom at Risk of Overheating, UBS Says
articles.translated_summary: Private credit lenders, and their deep pockets, are rapidly becoming an important source of capital for artificial intelligence development. That’s raising concerns at UBS Global Research.

articles.title: OpenAI's Sam Altman sees AI bubble forming as industry spending surges
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman thinks the artificial intelligence market is in a bubble, according to a report from The Verge published Friday.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI's Sam Altman sees AI bubble forming as industry spending surges
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman thinks the artificial intelligence market is in a bubble, according to a report from The Verge published Friday.

articles.title: For Silicon Valley, falling behind in AI is a bigger threat than tariffs
articles.summary: If there's one thing the White House, Wall Street and Silicon Valley can agree on, it's that artificial intelligence is a top priority.
articles.translated_title: For Silicon Valley, falling behind in AI is a bigger threat than tariffs
articles.translated_summary: If there's one thing the White House, Wall Street and Silicon Valley can agree on, it's that artificial intelligence is a top priority.

articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman warns of AI bubble, says investors are 'overexcited': report
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said he thinks the artificial intelligence market is in a bubble – comparable to the dot-com crash of the early 2000s, according to a report.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman warns of AI bubble, says investors are 'overexcited': report

articles.title: Madison Avenue Is Starting to Love A.I.
articles.summary: Advertisers are increasingly using generative artificial intelligence to make their commercials.
articles.translated_title: Madison Avenue Is Starting to Love A.I.
articles.translated_summary: Advertisers are increasingly using generative artificial intelligence to make their commercials.

articles.title: “AI is in a Bubble:” OpenAI CEO Sam Altman compares AI hype to the Dot-Com crash
articles.summary: Even as OpenAI edges toward a staggering $500 billion valuation, Sam Altman is warning that the artificial intelligence boom may be overheating. Speaking with reporters last week, the OpenAI CEO didn’t shy away from calling it what many in Silicon Valley whisper about: a bubble. In an interview with The Verge published Friday, Altman said,

articles.title: Nearly 90% of videogame developers use AI agents, Google study shows
articles.summary: A Google Cloud survey showed that 87% of videogame developers are using artificial intelligence agents to streamline and automate tasks, as the industry focuses on optimizing costs following a wave of record layoffs.
